name: Canadian Coast Guard: The Pirate Invasion
name_original: Canadian Coast Guard: The Pirate Invasion
description:
The pirates are invading Canada!
It´s up to you and your axe as a part of the Canadian Coast Guard to stop them!

Note about resolution: Please play at 1280 x 720.

Made for the Nordic Game Jam 2016 by Herluf Baggesen and Mads Buchmann.

Bugs:
You can´t get past level 7.
GUI is don goofed yo.
If you play at anything else than 1280x720 the game gets kinda funky.
